entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
